Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: In terms of the degree of polymerization , PQCDTB was greater than other OPV polymers by 2-3 times because of the introduction of long , branched side chains of quinacridone and benzothiadiazole.

Let's think step by step.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| PQCDTB |
| other OPV polymers |
| quinacridone |
| benzothiadiazole |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| PQCDTB |
| quinacridone |
| benzothiadiazole |

Explanation:

* "other OPV polymers" is not a specific material name, but a category of materials, so it is not included in the table.
* "long, branched side chains" are not material names, but rather a description of a property of some materials, so they are not included in the table.

Paragraph: In terms of the degree of polymerization , PQCDTB was greater than other OPV polymers by 2-3 times because of the introduction of long , branched side chains of quinacridone and benzothiadiazole.

Let's think step by step.

| Property Value |
| --- |
| PQCDTB |
| 2-3 times |
| long, branched side chains of quinacridone and benzothiadiazole |

In this paragraph, the "Property Value" entities refer to the degree of polymerization of PQCDTB and other OPV polymers, the factor of 2-3 times, and the long, branched side chains of quinacridone and benzothiadiazole. These entities are directly related to the properties and characteristics of the polymers being discussed.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Value of material property" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Value |
| --- |
| PQCDTB |
| 2-3 times |

In this revised list, I have removed the entity "long, branched side chains of quinacridone and benzothiadiazole" because it does not clearly refer to a value of a material property. Instead, it describes the structure of the side chains that contribute to the higher degree of polymerization of PQCDTB. The remaining entities, "PQCDTB" and "2-3 times," are clear values of material properties, specifically the degree of polymerization of PQCDTB and the factor by which it is greater than other OPV polymers.
